fullContent: Homeâ€º Battle RoyaleCrazy Cattle 3DBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenCrazy Cattle 3D is a one-player battle royale game where you control a bouncy sheep and try to knock other sheep in the herd. The physics are strange. And the movement of other sheep is absolute comedy. With a third-person perspective, you'll try to be the last sheep standing in the herd, all while the sheep slides and bounces uncontrollably. And if you die... The sheep explodes. In the funniest way.There are three maps to unlock. You start in Ireland, racing over green fields and dodging wooden fences. Win a few rounds to unlock snowy Sweden, where ice makes every turn a challenge. Keep going to open Egypt's sandy dunes, full of hidden fences and new colors. Each victory drops a shiny trophy into your personal trophy room.After Anna Mayberry released this game as a donationware on itch.io in April 2025, it blew up almost immediately, becoming viral on the internet. Play Crazy Cattle 3D now on OnlineGames.io and learn what's all the frenzy is about. And hey, please tell us your opinions. Did you like the game? What was the funniest part? Or do you think it's overrated? Let's meet in the comments below.ControlsW A S D: Move your sheepSpace: RestartEsc: Pause and open menuHow to Play Crazy Cattle 3DPick one of the three maps: Ireland, Sweden or Egypt. At first, only Ireland is unlockedUse WASD keys to move around. Avoid hitting fences or getting hit by another sheep, as that will make your sheep explode. Literally.Keep an eye on the sheep counter in the corner to see how many opponents remain.Win the round to earn a trophy, then jump right back on a new map.Even though it sounds simple, few people who could complete all three maps in Crazy Cattle 3D. Try now and see if you can!MapsIreland: Rolling green hills with clusters of wooden fences that test your skills.Sweden: Ice-covered slopes make you slide faster and it's perfect charge for knockouts.Egypt: Sandy dunes hide fences and corners, setting up surprise attacks. Be warned that Eygpt is the most difficult map.Crazy Cattle 3D Becoming ViralCrazy Cattle 3D showed up on itch.io on April 12, 2025, and within a week, it was everywhere. Anna Mayberry's sheep battle royale is far from fancy, but its crazy physics and fast rounds hooked players worldwide so much that TikTokers and YouTubers started posting clips of sheep rocketing into fences and flying off cliffs. The hashtag #CrazyCattle3D racked up millions of views on social media platforms within one month. Even gaming blogs took notice, praising its simple charm and nonstop fun.On Reddit, fans shared tips on the best maps: Ireland's green hills, Sweden's icy slopes, and Egypt's sandy dunes while talking about tense last-sheep-standing moments. A few viral YouTube videos surpassed 100,000 views, drawing more players into the frenzy.Today, Crazy Cattle 3D sits in itch.io's trending list and is playable on OnlineGames.io. What started as a small indie experiment has become a global laugh-fest, proving that simple ideas and silly physics can go viral overnight.DeveloperCrazy Cattle 3D is developed by Anna Mayberry.
